messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/15/2005 9:05:37 A.M. Mountain Standard Time, scott-wecht@erols.com writes: I know!  I know! Use Sandra s deschooling list of movies. I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/15/2005 9:05:37 A.M. Mountain Standard Time,
scott-wecht@... writes:

I know! I know!
Use Sandra's deschooling list of movies.
I confess. I did. It was great fun!


-------------------

Hey, those movies were carefully chosen to be fun and idea-sparking and
life-changing.

Just as someone wants to get unschooling, it's a good set, I think!

They're here:
_http://sandradodd.com/deschooling_ (http://sandradodd.com/deschooling)


Sandra
